name: FPS Gaming Quiz
description:
Fan of First Person Shooters? The FPS Quiz shows you screenshots of FPS games from a range of platforms, starting with the early years of gaming to modern AAA titles. 

  • Take the quiz 
  • Test your knowledge 
  • See if you can score a perfect 25 out of 25. 

Good luck! 

Oh! If there are shooters you'd like to see added in, post the name and platform in the comments. We'll play it, grab a screenshot, and add it to the quiz.
